author: arian_ghashghai
text:
"Why do so few pre-seed/seed investors invest in crazy startups?"

A structural cause:

> VCs raise money from LPs
> Most LPs favor concentrated portfolios (less # of companies, bigger check size)
> Concentrated portfolios discourage idiosyncratic risk
> More consensus capital

Deregulate at local level. Build more supply. Make all mortgages assumable. Get interest rates down. 

The situation can improve if we want it to.

author: ercwl
text:
The first time I saw SWIFT playing the blockchain game was in 2016. That was 9 years ago. You can still find the articles today. 

You’d think if there really was a realistic path to a tangible benefit they’d have figured it out over the last 9 years.

The reality is, they Swift announces new blockchain-based ledger with 30+ banks.

At Sibos, Javier Perez-Tasso, Swift CEO, revealed plans to build a blockchain-based shared ledger to enable instant, 24/7 cross-border payments.

Learn more https://swift.com/news-events/news/swift-introduces-blockchain-based-ledger…https://ws/swift-introduces-blockchain-based-ledger…

#swift#swift #swiftatsibos#swiftatsibos #sibos#sibos

effectively turning zcash into anonymous digital cashMost bullish thing I can think of for ZEC is if there was a robust multi-chain bridge with ZEC as the bridge/intermediate asset doing z->z transactions in the middle.

Ie, become the center of the multichain world, adding robust privacy along the way. Or something like that :)

author: brycent_
text:
Four months ago, I was making gaming content

I was a startup founder who raised $4.5m and failed

Nobody was checking for me, but I WANTED to get into venture

So I made myself undeniable, you can do the same.

author: brycent_
text:
A lot of founders would be better off if they stopped looking at Venture Capital as equal opportunity employment

The point of venture capital is to fund the top .001% of founders to chase the top .001% of returns

If you're trying to raise, look deep within yourself and ask

author: brycent_
text:
"I just need a chance"
"Nobody is responding to my deck"
"VC only invest in Ivy league founders" 

I can promise you nobody cares and if that's your mindset, you've already lost.

Know the game, and you can learn to play it better.

author: brycent_
text:
Whoever you are out there

I hope this late night rant makes you better
